DOC.brief_title: Healthy Term Infants Fed Milk-Based Formulas
DOC.criteria: Infant good health Infant singleton full term birth gestational age 3742 week Infant 's birth weight > 2490 g ( ~5 lbs 8 oz ) Infant 14 28 day age Parent ( ) confirm intention feed infant study product ( ) sole source nutrition duration study Parent ( ) confirm intention administer vitamin mineral supplement , DHA ARA supplement , solid foods/juices infant enrollment duration study An adverse maternal , fetal infant medical history potential effect tolerance , growth , and/or development . Infants use medication ( include OTC ) , home remedy , herbal preparation , probiotic rehydration fluid might affect gastrointestinal ( GI ) tolerance
